treatment-md.title: Torrenticola ussuriensis Sokolow 1940
treatment-md.article-title: New records of water mites of the family Torrenticolidae (Acari, Hydrachnidia) with descriptions of two new species from Nanshih River system in Taiwan and redescription of Torrenticola ussuriensis (Sokolow, 1940) from the Russian Far East
